script.message:
Welcome to Outpost 18!
In this game you are trying to destroy the enemy with your fleet of starships.

At the bottom of the screen you can see your hand.
You start with 2 cards if you're the first player, or 3 if you're going second.
This is your base.  You can play upgrade cards to protect it and generate more resources.

This panel shows your current stats and the resources you are generating.
The three resources are ion, ore, and labour, and these are used to enhance your ships.
This section is where you will play your ships to attack the enemy base.
This area shows the deck and discard pile.
This is the enemy's base.  You need to destroy this to win the game!

It's your turn now.
On your turn you can play a card in one of two ways.

Playing it as a ship will let you use its power and abilities to attack the enemy base.
Playing it as an upgrade will generate resources that unlock your ship abilities.
Try playing the Freighter card as a ship by dragging it from your hand to the green ship row.

Great! Ships cannot attack the turn you put them into play.
(unless they have the Hyperdrive passive.)

You're out of plays for now.
Click the End Turn button to end your turn and draw a card.

You need to generate 5 power to destroy the enemy base.
The freighter has 1 power, but it has an ability that will add another 2 power once the threshold is met.

The Centurion in your hand can generate the 1 labour and 1 ion you need.
Drag the Centrurion onto the blue base row to play it as an upgrade.

Now the Freighter's ability is active!
Click the End Turn button to end your turn and draw another card.

Your opponent played an upgrade with the DEF power!
You can't target his base or non-DEF upgrades until you destroy it.
Tap your Freighter to attack with it, adding 3 power to your power pool.

The DEF upgrade is highlighted since you have enough attack to destroy it.
Tap the upgrade to destroy it!

When you destroy an enemy upgrade you take that card into your hand.
You can use it immediately if you have enough plays.

Now let's play the Destroyer as a ship.
The Destroyer has two abilities with different thresholds.

Now click End Turn.
Your ships that attacked this turn will be put into the discard pile.

We can activate both Destroyer abilities by playing our Vessel as an upgrade.
That will give us enough power to destroy the enemy base!
Now attack with the Destroyer by tapping it and use that power to destroy the enemy base!
